about_the_game:
Lonesome Village - Digital Artbook is 38 pages fully illustrated book to know more about the art of the locations, characters, and world of Lonesome Village.

Do you want to know more about the awesome art of Lonesome Village?
Do you want to see the in-game graphical assets in detail?
Do you want to see exclusive and never-seen-before art assets from the game?

This Artbook is for you!

This official Artbook created by ourselves has detailed information and images to know more about the cute and awesome graphical assets and the art of Lonesome Village.

Instructions


The Artbook will be placed in the same folder as the game.

You will be able to access the folder by pressing RightClick on the game icon on Steam -> Properties-> Local Files -> Browse

It should be a .PDF File named "LV_Artbook.pdf"

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Yosemite
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 @ 3.2 GHZ
  • Storage: 28 MB available space

name: Lonesome Village - Digital Artbook

  • Storage: 28 MB available space
